column1: Here is a test build for this issue:
Please ask the customer to install it on some of the machines and test it.
Let me know if it works as expected.
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #419969 - - File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
Thank you for your time today.
I will attach logs under the ticket on SupportPortal, please let me know if you are able to download it.
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #419969 - - File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #419969 - - File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
I can do tomorrow at 13:00 Kyiv time.
I will send you a zoom meeting invitation right away.
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #419969 - - File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
Customer will be available today starting from 16:00 Kyiv time and tomorrow or Friday during all day starting from 11:00.
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #419969 - - File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
I will know about customer availability and get back to you.
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #419969 - - File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
Let me know if we can schedule a meeting with the customers in order to investigate if the issue can be reproduced with a newer EPP Client.
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #419969 - - File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
Thank you for the additional details.
I will get back to you once I have a feedback from the engineers.
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #419969 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000FJGrg:ref - File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
Seems like we managed to recreate the scenario if enable Restrict Content Detection option in CAP policy.
We are not sure that this option is 100% the reason because customer used it for a very long time, but we're just sharing with you our observation.
So, when we used the Restrict Content Detection the similar behavior repeated, and when we disabled it, the situation stared to be better and files were blocked.
Please try to recreate this in your environment.
Subject: File upload block to Web MS Teams works unstable [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0FJGrg:ref ]
Thank you for the details and the log file.
I opened an internal ticket about this and I'm waiting for a feedback from the engineers.
